entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
